16/01/30/1419211 story

20160130a - Nested Comment tests

posted by martyb on Saturday January 30, @10:14AM   
from the turtles dept.

Story on which to hang comments of various depths of reply.

Intended to see behavior of highly nested comments on a small display (e.g. mobile phone). Currently, comments can nest to a depth of [at least] 8, with each reply to a comment indented from its parent. At small fonts sizes, this can be accommodated on a small display.

Hypothesis: with a 'larger' font, nested replies would no longer 'fit' on the display.

UPDATE: Maximum depth of nesting for comment replies is set by the site var:

max_depth (max depth for nesting of comments)

On prod, its value was set to 10; on dev, it was set to 7. About 25 minutes ago, I change dev to match prod so both are now set to 10.

This is our Dev Server

posted by mrcoolbp on Wednesday October 21 2015, @02:09PM   
from the duh dept.

This is our dev server. There are many like it but this one is ours.

Feel free to do experiment/break the site here, please let us know if you find an issue that is not already in the list (https://github.com/SoylentNews/rehash/issues) by submitting a bug on github (https://github.com/SoylentNews/rehash/issues/new).
